signals.reason: Recent 1‑min candles show a clear downtrend from 208.22 to 207.58, EMA9 is below EMA21, RSI likely below 50, MACD histogram negative, price near lower Bollinger Band and no strong bullish reversal pattern. Trend and momentum indicators support a short‑term bearish move.
